main.name: Doug Moore
main.description: Well-rounded Application Developer with a love for web development and to help others.  #allaroundD
main.bio: My name is Doug, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. A detail-oriented and collaborative Consultant Application Developer with extensive experience in the financial industry. Recently received certificate for Full Stack Web Development. Reliable team player skilled in multiple programming languages, multiple database platforms, Data Warehousing, and Reporting tools. Strong analytical skills support a proven ability to effectively resolve problems. Applies an active listening approach to encourage productive teamwork while developing and maintaining effective working relationships across an organization.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, React, MongoDB, MySQL, Java, SQL, Oracle, Bootstrap

education.school: University of Toronto School of Continuing Studies

work.title: Application Developer
work.description: Designed, developed and supported a suite of 10 Financial Business Intelligence Reporting applications, including root cause analysis of Production incidents, to ensure application availability and achievement of client Service Level Agreements (SLAs). Support required monitoring batch jobs and being on an on-call rotation to troubleshoot and resolve incidents to prevent or minimize impact.

projects.title: Discord Clone
projects.category: Discord Clone built with ReactJS and Firestore

projects.title: Card Generator
projects.category: My second group project using Javascript, mysql, ORM, and an image uploader

projects.title: Mood-Food-and-Chill
projects.category: My first group project using 2 APIs

projects.title: Note Taker
projects.category: Application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This application uses an express backend and saves and retrieves note data from a JSON file.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: A simple weather dashboard with 5-day forecast using API

projects.title: Work Day Scheduler
projects.category: A work day scheduler that uses local storage

testimonials.text: Thank you for going above and beyond assisting our client! Your thorough investigation skills, prompt response turnaround time and care to our clients made a big difference in achieving the results. You are a true Client Champion! We appreciate your support as always!
testimonials.user: Rain Zuo -- from an Impact Award

testimonials.text: Doug has a very good understanding of the reporting tools and applications we support. He is diligent and dependable for production application support. For change requests, Doug will see the tasks through to the end. Doug is a strong team player, always willing to help other team members.
testimonials.user: Eva Chan -- from a performance review
